name: EARTHWYRM
description:
A puzzle where you need to guide a worm through a series of puzzle rooms.

You can modify the environment, but not control the worm directly. To finish a room, guide the worm to the exit pipe.

There are 17 levels in total.

Hotkeys:

The entire game can be played with mouse only, hotkeys are optional. Most of them can be viewed in game (on button tooltips), so you don't need to remember them.

  • Space — Play/pause
  • R — Restart level
  • Tab — Change game speed
  • 1..4 — Select a tool
  • Left click (with an active tool) — Use the tool
  • Right click — Deactivate the tool
FAQ:

* How does "Bait" work?

  When a worm bonks into a wall and can't decide between going left or right, usually it always goes right. But if you place a bait, it will will move in the direction of the bait instead.

  The bait is only considered when left and right paths are equally good. E.g. if one of them requires digging and the other doesn't, the bait will be ignored and the first one will be selected.
